fields.name: HintType
fields.description: The specification of whether this hint supports affinity or anti-affinity with the referenced resources.

fields.name: ResourceId
fields.description: The resource ID of the target object that the placement hints will be checked against, e.g., the bare metal node to host the virtual machine.

fields.name: SchedulingExecution
fields.description: The indicator of whether the hint is a hard or soft requirement during scheduling.

fields.name: Scope
fields.description: The scope for the virtual machine affinity or anti-affinity placement hint. It should always be "Machine" in the case of node affinity.
